name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!"

name: 兄貴
message: "You see, we have an agreement with Mr. Toue. Even if we get a little violent, no one's gonna touch us."

name: 兄貴
message: "It's your own damn fault for pickin' a fight with us."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit...!"
If I'd listened when Clear said he heard those footsteps... we might've gotten away.
Clear was right.
It's all my fault...

name: 兄貴
message: "And now for the finishing touch. I'll even let you keep that stupid mask on."
The man pulls a small bottle from his breast pocket. It's filled with a transparent liquid.

name: 兄貴
message: "Know what this is? ...It's sulfuric acid. Enjoy."
He turns the bottle upside down... pouring it out on Clear's head.
The substance sizzles and smokes where it touches his hair.

name: 兄貴
message: "Haha..."
I'm so scared, I can't breathe. My legs are shaking.
Clear! No!
The awful smell of burning hair and flesh fills the alley.
Clear is lying on his back, motionless.
It must hurt like hell... but he isn't moving.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Clear! No, Clear! Get up!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!"

name: クリア
message: "Yes, Master."
...Huh?
Clear stands up, his head still smoking.

name: 兄貴
message: "Hey... What's with this guy?"

name: クリア
message: "Are you done yet? Please let go of my master."
Clear calmly approaches the man.
The smile has vanished from the gangster's face. He staggers backward.

name: 兄貴
message: "M-Monster! Stay back!"

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Run!"
The gangsters flee, shrieking like little girls.
